ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: What do you want to bet the other Singing Steel Pieces are not in the game because they ran out of ideas for effects to give them? Too bad the rumour that all
ygData.messageBody:
What do you want to bet the other Singing Steel Pieces are not in the game
because they ran out of ideas for effects to give them?

Too bad the rumour that all the melee and hybrid BP's had Gate, I was
looking forward to that. I've been playing my bard a whole lot more lately
and having fun, but there are still times when I play my casters solely due
to the inconveniences of being a melee class. ;-(

What effects do you think would be good for us? I know no one can be too
thrilled about the Summon Food and Water. What could we get that would be
better used, seem like most of the other classes get truly useful effects so
far for the most part.

Kitasi Faegehearper
